attributes.action: provide legal aid for all  court proceedings in cases of domestic violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Domestic violence normally involves an element of financial control on the part of the perpetrator.  The majority of victims are women who are statistically more likely to have a smaller incomes than their husbands.  Frequently this is more marked where there is domestic violence, as the dynamics rely on isolation and control of the victim. Perpetrators are likely to try to protract legal proceedings as they are often less vulnerable to the financial repercussions.
